#summary Ontology Design Pattern: Scientific Investigation
#sidebar SIOSideBar
=Investigation=
An investigation (SIO_000747) aims to uncover facts about an object of study. A scientific investigation, or experiment, aims to provide facts to support or dispute a well formulated hypothesis.  Investigations _typically_ involves:

 * the formulation of [http://semanticscience.org/resource/SIO_000284 hypothesis]
 * the development and/or adoption of study design
 * the preparation of specimen(s)
 * the execution of an assay 
 * the collection of observations
 * the analysis of tabulated observations
 * the interpretation of the results
 * the preparation of an investigational report
